Text: Nepotu, you are the greatest uploader on piratebay.  Many many thanks
You're welcome and thank you, bro!

Sorry chunny9! From where I took this torrent it had no credit. When is not my rip and I don't know the ripper I put "Credit: ???". What can I do more? Then people will know it's not my rip. If you have another proposal, tell me, please!

@chuny9
